text: Gen Z and Healthcare: A Virtual First Approach? 🤔💻Did you know that Gen Zers make up 20% of the US population? 😱 As they build lifelong habits, how will they engage with the healthcare system? 🤦‍♀️ It's time to rethink traditional approaches! 💡Gen Z wants a relationship based on use cases, not a one-size-fits-all paradigm. 💼 They'll go to a brick-and-mortar facility when necessary, but they're virtual first for healthcare. 📱💻What do you think? Are we adapting quickly enough to meet the changing needs of Gen Z? 🤔 Let's discuss! 💬
